faq.question: What is the time frame to return an item?
faq.answer: Items must be returned within 10 days of the delivery date.

faq.question: What are the conditions for an item to be eligible for return?
faq.answer: Products must be unworn, unwashed, and in their original packaging with all tags attached.

faq.question: Are sale items eligible for returns?
faq.answer: No, sale items and customized products are not eligible for returns or exchanges unless they are defective or damaged.

faq.question: How do I initiate a return?
faq.answer: Contact customer support with your order number and reason for the return to initiate the process.

faq.question: Who is responsible for return shipping costs?
faq.answer: Free return shipping is available for domestic orders. For international returns, the customer is responsible for shipping costs.

faq.question: When should returns be shipped after receiving the return shipping label?
faq.answer: Returns should be shipped within 7 days of receiving the return shipping label.

faq.question: How long does it take to receive a refund after a return?
faq.answer: If the return is approved, refunds are processed within 7-10 business days, and the credit is applied to the original method of payment.

faq.question: Is the original shipping cost refundable?
faq.answer: No, the original shipping cost is non-refundable unless the return is due to an error by the company.

faq.question: Can I exchange an item?
faq.answer: Yes, items can be exchanged for a different size or color within 10 days of the delivery date, as long as they meet the same conditions as returns.

faq.question: How do I exchange an item?
faq.answer: Contact customer support to initiate the exchange, and the new item will be shipped after receiving the original one and confirming its condition.

faq.question: What should I do if I receive a defective or damaged product?
faq.answer: Contact customer support immediately to arrange for a replacement or full refund, including shipping costs.

faq.question: What items are non-returnable?
faq.answer: Non-returnable items include gift cards, final sale items, and customized or personalized products.
